title: Looking for a team
body: Hey guys, I'm RomeoPm, I'm looking to organise a team. I got out of my provisionals at silver 3 but due to me being a sup main, i have lacked the carry ability when I'm stuck with a bad team, landing me in silver 3 with a terrible kda. I'm looking for anyone interested in forming a team! add me in game

replies.body: hi where lookngg for a sup to join ourr ranked team im currently silver 2 i main mid our jg is silver 2 and our top is gold 1 if your interested i wantt to do training gammes once of twice a week ffor a few hours then as many ranked games on a sunday we can get
